title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
role: On Christmas Day, on Christmas Day

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
role: Shelley got up and killed the turds

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
role: On Christmas Day, in the MORNING! [picks up the piano...]

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
text: Golly, that sure was swell. I'd say my Christmas special is going super-fantastic. Well, now it's time to hear from perhaps the two most important people of the whole season.

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
text: Hello, everyone, and welcome to McKemick's. Now, please put your hands together and welcome... Saint Nicholas and Jesus Christ.

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
text: How are you all doing tomight?

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
text: You know, Jesus, there've been so many songs written about us over the years.

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
text: That's right, Santa, and we love each and every one of them. Like this one.

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
role: Joy to the world, for I have come.

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
role: Let every heart prepare Me room. [gets some applause]

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
text: And heaven and heaven and nature sing.

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
text: You know, Jesus, that is a nice song, but I like... this one:

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
role: Up on the housetop reindeer pause

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
role: Out comes good old... me. [get some applause]

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
role: Down through the chimney with lots of toys

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
role: All for the little ones' Christmas joys

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
role: Ho ho ho! Who wouldn't go?

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
role: Ho ho ho! Who wouldn't go?

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
text: Up on the housetop, click click click.

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
role: Down through the chimney with good old... me.

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
role: Away in a manger, no crib for My bed

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
role: That's where cute little old Me lay down My sweet head.

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
text: gets some applause and sings upbeat

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
role: O come, all ye faithful, joyful and triumphant

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
role: O come ye to Bethlehem to see-ee Me...

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
text: Hark, the herald angels sing, Glory-

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
text: All is calm, all is bright

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
text: Holy Me, so tender and mild.

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
text: Okay, Jesus. Here's one you might remember:

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
role: Her name is Rio and she dances on the sand

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
role: Just like that river twistin' through the dusty land.

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
text: Uh. Santa, Santa, Santa, that's not a Christmas song, bud. Ah... ah-

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
text: I know, but there's, like, 300 Jesus Christmas songs and only four fucking Santa ones! It's not fair! Just do it yourself! I'm leaving.

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
text: Aw, come on, Santa. You can't leave.

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
text: But Santa... The weather outside is frightful

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
text: Well, since I've no place to go.

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
text: Leett it snow, let it snow, let it snow.

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
text: It doesn't show signs of stoppin'.

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
text: But I brought some corn for poopity poppin'.

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
text: The lights are turned way down low, so

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
role: Let it snow, let it snow, let it snow.

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
text: And, my dear, we're still good-bop-be-byein',

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
text: But as long as you love me so,

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
text: they dance and hold hands, then Jesus twirls him. Santa spins off the stage

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
role: Let it snow, let it snow,

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
text: slides back on stage on his knees

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
role: Her name is Rio and she dances on the sand!

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
text: the club claps enthusiastically. The pianist winks at the duo and points at them. Jesus points back, and Santa holds up a thumb

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
text: STAR WARS LETTERING "Mr. Hankey's Christmas Classics"

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
text: A toilet bowl. Mr. Hankey is floating on the water there.

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
text: Well, I guess that's about the end of my Christmas album. Gosh! It was so nice hangin' out with you all again. Well, I guess if there's just... one thing I have left to say, it would be this:

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
role: Have yourself a merry little Christmas

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
role: From now on, our troubles will be out of sight.

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
role: Have yourself a merry little Christmas

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
role: Make the Yuletide gay. [hops out of the bowl]

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
role: From now on, our troubles will be miles away.

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
role: [hops onto a ham as a family of four looks on, leaves his mark,

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
role: [In the next scene Stan, Kyle, Cartman, and Kenny join him.

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
role: Clips of Wendy, Sheila, the Mayor, Ms. Crabtree, and Liane follow.]

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
role: Here we are as in olden days,

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
role: Gather near to us once more.

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
text: Mr. Hankey hops onto Santa's shoulder as Jesus looks on

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
text: Through the years we all will be together

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
text: the boys embrace shoulders and stand united

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
text: the chandelier drops on Kenny and the others back away, shocked

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
text: Hang a shining star above the highest bough.

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
role: [Kyle lifts Mr. Hankey up to do this. Sharon hugs and kisses

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
role: JFK and Hitler approach the fireplace and embrace]

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
text: And have yourself a merry little Christmas now.

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
role: Sheila, Gerald, Ike, Mr. Mackey in a bell, Satan, Jimmy the mailman

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
role: Jesus, Santa, Hitler, Mr. Garrison in Santa outfit, and Shelley.

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
role: Kyle climbs down from the ladder with Mr. Hankey in hand and

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
role: stands with Stan and Cartman, and rats rush in to chew on Kenny.]

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
text: Bye, Mr. Hankey. See you next year.

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
text: The camera zooms back from a pink house not seen before.

title: MR HANKEY S CHRISTMAS CLASSICS
text: End of Mr. Hankey's Christmas Classics. "Dreidel, Dreidel, Dreidel" plays as the anchor and the frizzy monster continue to box and the credits roll.
